successes.title: The BIG Turtle Shell®: Rugged, Wireless BoomBox & Power Bank
successes.description: The Big Turtle Shell® is a rugged wireless Bluetooth speaker built for a life of action. Water resistant and durable with a huge sound.

Pledges.description: Join us for the journey - be part of the process and see behind the scenes. Receive Backer Only updates that document the project and development process.

CALAMARI 3-IN-1 USB CABLE - ODT STICKER SET AND LANYARD - Be one of the first to have our new Calamari Charging Cable.  Rep your Outdoor Tech love with a sticker set and lanyard. (Add $2 for shipping to Canada, $2 for international shipping.)

EARLY ADOPTER REWARD - Help us get started!  ONE BIG TURTLE SHELL® BOOMBOX. This speaker will retail for more than $229.95. Free shipping within USA. (Add $20 for shipping to Canada, $30 for international shipping.)
ONE BIG TURTLE SHELL® BOOMBOX. This speaker will retail for more than $229.95. Free shipping within USA. (Add $20 for shipping to Canada, $30 for international shipping.)
ONE BIG TURTLE SHELL® BOOMBOX (July Delivery). This speaker will retail for more than $229.95. Free shipping within USA. (Add $20 for shipping to Canada, $30 for international shipping.)

TURTLE SHELL® SET - TO EXPAND YOUR SOUND - One Big Turtle Shell® BoomBox and One Little Turtle Shell® BoomBox along with a Calamari 3-in-1 USB charging cable. This speaker set will retail for more than $374.95. Free shipping within USA. (Add $20 for shipping to Canada, $30 for international shipping.)

BIG TURTLE SHELL® SET - DOUBLE YOUR SOUND - Two Big Turtle Shell® BoomBoxes along with a Calamari 3-in-1 USB charging cable. This speaker set will retail for more than $474.95. Free shipping within USA. (Add $20 for shipping to Canada, $30 for international shipping.)

BIG TURTLE SHELL® SET - DOUBLE YOUR SOUND - Two Big Turtle Shell® BoomBoxes along with a Calamari 3-in-1 USB charging cable. This speaker set will retail for more than $474.95. Free shipping within USA. (Add $20 for shipping to Canada, $30 for international shipping.)
